introduction: This comprehensive marketing relationship plan is designed for SaaS companies leveraging Product-Led Growth (PLG) strategies combined with sales-assisted motions. The plan addresses the unique dynamics of B2B software where customer success directly impacts revenue through subscription renewals, expansion, and advocacy. Success in SaaS requires understanding that the customer journey extends far beyond the initial sale - from trial activation through ongoing adoption, expansion, and ultimately becoming a champion for your product. This plan emphasizes behavioral triggers, usage-based segmentation, and value-driven communication across the entire customer lifecycle.

how_brevo_helps_you.why_brevo_is_better: Brevo's event-based automation connects to your product analytics to trigger messages based on user behavior in real-time. When a user completes (or fails to complete) activation milestones, automated workflows deliver perfectly-timed nudges that dramatically improve trial conversion rates.
how_brevo_helps_you.omnichannel_channels: Email for educational content and feature highlights + In-app messages for contextual activation prompts + SMS for urgent trial reminders and human-touch outreach + Push for re-engagement and deadline alerts
how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Pre-built SaaS trial workflows with behavioral triggers reduce implementation time by 60%. API integration with common product analytics platforms (Segment, Mixpanel, Amplitude) enables quick deployment.

how_brevo_helps_you.why_brevo_is_better: Integration with your product database enables behavior-based triggers that reach users with relevant feature education precisely when they're ready. The system identifies feature usage gaps and delivers personalized adoption campaigns automatically.
how_brevo_helps_you.omnichannel_channels: Email for feature tutorials and success stories + In-app for contextual feature tips and walkthroughs + Push for engagement reminders and new feature announcements + SMS for personal outreach to high-value users
how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Feature adoption templates with pre-built behavioral triggers can be customized to your specific features within hours. Dynamic content blocks ensure relevance without creating dozens of separate campaigns.

how_brevo_helps_you.why_brevo_is_better: Usage-decline triggers and health score integration enable proactive intervention days or weeks before customers consider cancelling. The system routes high-value at-risk accounts to CSMs while automating outreach for smaller accounts.
how_brevo_helps_you.omnichannel_channels: Email for proactive check-ins and value reminders + SMS for personal CSM outreach + In-app for intervention prompts and help offers + Task creation for CSM follow-up on critical accounts
how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Health score integration with common CS platforms (Gainsight, ChurnZero, Totango) enables automated at-risk identification and intervention workflows with minimal setup.

how_brevo_helps_you.why_brevo_is_better: Usage tracking integration identifies expansion signals (approaching limits, new use cases, team growth) and delivers timely upgrade messaging. The system differentiates between product-led and sales-assisted motions based on account size.
how_brevo_helps_you.omnichannel_channels: Email for upgrade education and ROI messaging + In-app for usage alerts and upgrade prompts + SMS for time-sensitive limit warnings + Sales alerts for high-value expansion opportunities
how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Pre-built expansion workflows with limit-based triggers and dynamic pricing content can be activated within days of implementation.

how_brevo_helps_you.why_brevo_is_better: NPS response integration triggers advocacy requests at peak satisfaction moments. The system tracks referral attribution and automates reward fulfillment while identifying top advocates for deeper engagement.
how_brevo_helps_you.omnichannel_channels: Email for referral program promotion and success notifications + In-app for seamless sharing and tracking + Push for referral conversion alerts + SMS for personal thank-you and ambassador invitations
how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Referral program templates with tracking, attribution, and reward automation can be launched within a week. Integration with review platforms streamlines public review requests.

conclusion: SaaS companies that implement these relationship marketing programs can expect significantly higher trial-to-paid conversion rates, improved net revenue retention through proactive expansion and churn prevention, and a sustainable growth engine powered by customer advocacy. The programs recognize that in subscription businesses, the initial sale is just the beginning - true success comes from continuous value delivery, proactive relationship management, and turning customers into champions. By combining behavioral automation with human-touch at critical moments, these programs scale efficiently while maintaining the personal connection that drives long-term customer success.
